meaningMnemonic: What kind of <radical>tree</radical> is <radical>spicy</radical>? A <kanji>Japanese birch</kanji>, or <kanji>birch</kanji>, obviously. There's nothing spicier than a Japanese birch!
readingMnemonic: You can only cut down a <kanji>Japanese birch</kanji> using <reading>a zoo saw</reading> (あずさ) because a regular saw can't handle how spicy these trees are.
